item.title: 人工智能竞争日趋激烈，OpenAI 的奥特曼又要开始世界巡演了
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官萨姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）将在未来几周内往返于东京、新德里、迪拜和德国之间，因为主导人工智能的竞争正变得更加紧迫。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman will spend the coming weeks jetting between Tokyo, New Delhi, Dubai and Germany as the race to dominate artificial intelligence takes on new urgency.】

item.title: DeepSeek 应用程序下载量居全球首位，印度遥遥领先
item.description: DeepSeek 的人工智能助手在 140 个市场的下载量最高的移动应用程序中名列榜首，其中印度的新用户所占比例最大。【原文：DeepSeek’s AI assistant topped the list of most downloaded mobile apps across 140 markets, with India accounting for the largest percentage of new users.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁逼近，韩国出口保持韧性
item.description: 1 月份，韩国出口保持增长势头，在国内政治动荡和唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁阴影笼罩的新年伊始保持乐观。【原文：South Korea’s exports maintained growth momentum in January, keeping optimism alive at the start of a year overshadowed by domestic political turmoil and Donald Trump’s tariff threat.】

item.title: 德克萨斯证券交易所融资 1.61 亿美元，预计 2026 年开始交易
item.description: 拟成立的德克萨斯证券交易所的母公司德克萨斯证券交易所集团公司（TXSE Group Inc.【原文：TXSE Group Inc., parent company of the proposed Texas Stock Exchange, closed its initial fundraising round at $161 million and said the TXSE has filed for registration as a bourse with the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 钢铁和铝关税将影响数百万吨进口商品
item.description: 铝和钢是唐纳德-特朗普总统第一任期内颁布的首批关税措施之一。预计周六将恢复这些措施，这将影响到数百万吨的进口金属。【原文：Aluminum and steel were among the first tariffs to be enacted during President Donald Trump’s first term. A revival of those measures is expected Saturday, which would affect millions of tons of imported metal.】

item.title: 穆迪两名评级分析师在华盛顿美航坠机事故中丧生
item.description: 信用评级公司穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的两名分析师克里斯托弗-柯林斯（Christopher Collins）和梅丽莎-尼坎德里（Melissa Nicandri）在周三晚美国航空集团公司（American Airlines Group Inc.【原文：Two analysts at Moody’s Ratings — Christopher Collins and Melissa Nicandri — were among the 67 people killed in a midair collision between an American Airlines Group Inc. flight and a military helicopter in Washington on Wednesday night, the credit-grading firm said.】

item.title: 美国法警不会在参议员要求的最后期限前列出加密资产清单
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的人士称，美国法警局将不会在周五的最后期限前告知一位有影响力的参议员其控制的比特币资产的确切数量以及计划如何管理这些资产。【原文：The US Marshals Service will not meet a Friday deadline to tell an influential senator the exact number of Bitcoin assets it controls and how it plans to manage them, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约市抨击优步和 Lyft 在司机加薪问题上 "造谣生事
item.description: 纽约市共享出行监管机构称，优步公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：New York City’s rideshare regulator said Uber Technologies Inc. and Lyft Inc. are “spreading disinformation” in emails sent to drivers and riders about proposed rules that would give drivers a roughly 6% pay hike.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚政治动荡后未能获得惠誉评级上调
item.description: 塞尔维亚未能获得惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）提升其主权信用评级，此前大规模抗议活动震撼了这个巴尔干国家，并对亚历山大-武契奇（Aleksandar Vucic）总统长达十年的统治提出了挑战。【原文：Serbia failed to secure an upgrade of its sovereign credit score from Fitch Ratings after mass protests shook the Balkan nation and challenged the decade-long rule of President Aleksandar Vucic.】

item.title: 卢比奥拉美之行带来特朗普的强硬信息
item.description: 马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）作为美国最高外交官的首次出访选择了拉丁美洲，这加强了唐纳德-特朗普总统在第二个任期初期的两个优先事项：驱逐出境和确保巴拿马运河不受中国控制。【原文：Marco Rubio’s choice of Latin America for his first trip abroad as top US diplomat reinforces two of President Donald Trump’s priorities early in his second term — deportations and securing the Panama Canal from perceived Chinese control.】

item.title: 市场危险的一周，华尔街掀起安全交易热潮
item.description: 中国的一项突破震撼了美国科技行业的核心。唐纳德-特朗普总统发誓要对主要贸易伙伴采取行动，关税大戏由此升级。鹰派的美联储再次令痴迷于通货膨胀的交易员们感到震惊。【原文：A breakthrough in China shakes the US tech sector to its core. Tariff drama escalates with President Donald Trump vowing action against major trading partners. A hawkish Federal Reserve jars inflation-obsessed traders anew.】

item.title: 美国牛群数量降至 74 年最低点，牛肉价格将持续走高
item.description: 由于牧场干燥和牛肉需求旺盛，牛群连续第五年未能扩大，美国的牛供应量降至 1951 年以来的最低点。【原文：America’s cattle supplies dropped to the lowest since 1951 as dry pastures and strong beef demand prevented the herd from expanding for the fifth straight year.】

item.title: Zayo 完成首次 14 亿美元光纤支持债券销售

item.title: 得克萨斯州盟友警告：特朗普的科技伙伴难逃美国审查
item.description: 排着队向唐纳德-特朗普致敬的科技公司老板们可能在欧盟找到了共同的敌人，但据这位新总统的一位重要盟友说，这并不能使他们免于在自己的主场受到法律制裁。【原文：The tech bosses who’ve lined up to pay homage to Donald Trump may have found a common enemy in the European Union, but that won’t save them from legal enforcement on their home ground, according to one of the new president’s key allies.】

item.title: 前美联储顾问被美方指控为中国窃取机密
item.description: 美国司法部周五表示，美联储理事会的一名前高级顾问因涉嫌密谋窃取政府贸易机密以谋取中国利益而被捕。【原文：A former senior adviser for the Federal Reserve Board of Governors was arrested on charges that he conspired to steal government trade secrets to benefit China, the US Justice Department said Friday.】

item.title: Meta 公司讨论在特拉华州以外重新注册公司事宜
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Meta Platforms 公司正在讨论在特拉华州以外重新注册公司的事宜，该公司自 2004 年成立以来一直在特拉华州合法注册。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is discussing reincorporating its business outside of Delaware, where the company has been legally incorporated since its founding in 2004, according to a person familiar with the conversations.】

item.title: 风险投资家沃尔夫呼吁增加投资以应对 DeepSeek 的 "威胁
item.description: Lux Capital 公司联合创始人乔希-沃尔夫（Josh Wolfe）称中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 是 "严重的国家安全威胁"，并将该公司以美国竞争对手极低的成本开发出人工智能模型描述为给美国敲响了重要的 "警钟"。【原文：Calling Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek a “grave national security threat,” Lux Capital co-founder Josh Wolfe described the company’s development of an AI model at a fraction of the cost of US rivals as a major “wake up call” for America.】

item.title: 报道称，俄罗斯法院裁定将顶级谷物贸易商收归国有
item.description: 据《消息报》周五晚些时候报道，俄罗斯一家法院裁定，大型谷物贸易公司罗德尼-波利亚有限责任公司（Rodnie Polya LLC）应由国家控制。【原文：A Russian court ruled major grain trading house Rodnie Polya LLC should come under state control, Kommersant newspaper reported late Friday.】

item.title: 苹果放弃开发与 Mac 连接的增强现实眼镜
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）取消了一个制造可与其设备配对的先进增强现实眼镜的项目，这标志着该公司在努力打造一款能吸引普通消费者的耳机方面遭遇了最新挫折。【原文：Apple Inc. has canceled a project to build advanced augmented reality glasses that would pair with its devices, marking the latest setback in its effort to create a headset that appeals to typical consumers.】

item.title: 经济学家匆忙应对特朗普不断变化的关税目标
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统发誓要对墨西哥和加拿大的商品征收 25% 的关税，这让经济学家们竞相估算这对三国企业和家庭的影响。【原文：President Donald Trump’s vow to unleash 25% tariffs on goods from Mexico and Canada has sent economists racing to estimate the impact on businesses and households across all three nations.】

item.title: 关税在即，汽车、芯片制造商和中国股市准备应对冲击
item.description: 周五下午，美国股市下滑，汽车制造商和中国公司领跌，原因是白宫表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统打算在周六推进对墨西哥和加拿大征收25%关税、对中国征收10%关税的计划。【原文：US stocks slipped on Friday afternoon, with carmakers and Chinese companies leading the decline, as the White House said President Donald Trump intends to move ahead with plans on Saturday to impose 25% tariffs on Mexico and Canada and a 10% levy on China.】

item.title: 继 DeepSeek 之后，OpenAI 发布更便宜的 o3-Mini 模型
item.description: OpenAI推出了一个新的轻量级人工智能模型，称其能够进行类似人类的推理，并提高了效率；在中国的DeepSeek公司发布开源模型后，该产品将受到密切关注。【原文：OpenAI rolled out a new, lightweight artificial intelligence model that it said is capable of humanlike reasoning and makes gains on efficiency — a product that will be closely watched following the release of an open-source model from China’s DeepSeek.】

item.title: 从太空看，干涸的阿根廷大豆田看起来更糟糕了
